mergeResults.content: Identity: 40-year-old former headman of Lisle; skilled rider with possible military background; stoic, pragmatic, stubborn to the point of self-destruction. State: Newly awakened immensely powerful Mage-Gift (unknown type, possibly Firestarting)—burned open mental channels cause white-hot agony, blurred vision, teetering sanity; Gift-shock severe; physically exhausted but forcing himself through sheer willpower. Arc: Witnessed entire village destroyed and people carried off during bandit attack; believes others caused destruction—doesn't yet fully accept he did it himself; driven by duty to warn Haven despite trauma; initially dismissed Senta as 'insufferable horse,' called her for mercy killing. Relationship with Senta: Chosen by her—bond snapped into place when their eyes locked; her unconditional love and mental bridges stabilized his fracturing mind enough to survive; accepts bond pragmatically ('I'm in no position to argue') but resists her care ('If you tire, I'll drag you'); their connection allows mind-speech though it pains his ragged channels. Evidence gathered: Red robes hidden under bandit clothing; suspects organized sect, not simple bandits; tracks lead toward Menmellith.

Identity: 40-year-old former headman of Lisle; skilled rider with possible military background from border proximity; stoic, pragmatic, stubborn to the point of self-destruction; believed Herald-Mages were historical fiction until now.
State: Unconscious but stable at Haven Healers' Collegium; newly awakened immensely powerful Mage-Gift (unknown type, possibly Firestarting)—burned open mental channels caused white-hot agony, blurred vision; memories of Lisle destruction still blocked/suppressed.
Arc: Witnessed entire village destroyed and people carried off during bandit attack → doesn't yet fully accept he caused the destruction himself → Gift-shock caused four-day unconsciousness during journey to Haven → driven by duty to warn Haven despite trauma.
Stance: [Senta] Chosen by her—bond snapped into place when their eyes locked → her unconditional love and mental bridges stabilized his fracturing mind enough to survive → shifted from resistance ('insufferable horse,' mercy killing request) to partnership ('we face it together'); accepts bond pragmatically but ordered her to knock him out if he loses control—accepts danger he poses; their connection allows mind-speech though it pained his ragged channels.
Quotes: 'I'm in no position to argue' (accepting bond pragmatically); 'If you tire, I'll drag you' (resisting care while accepting partnership).
Evidence gathered: Red robes hidden under bandit clothing; suspects organized sect; tracks lead toward Menmellith; theories captives meant for blood magic ritual sacrifice (old Karsite practice).

mergeResults.content:
Identity: 40-year-old former headman of Lisle; skilled rider with possible military background from border proximity; stoic, pragmatic, stubborn to the point of self-destruction; believed Herald-Mages were historical fiction until now; instinctive distrust of Karsites from decades fighting border raids.
State: Recovering at Haven Healers' Collegium, assigned Healer's cottage for containment; newly confirmed immensely powerful Mage-Gift (not seen since Vanyel's era)—capable of leveling villages; carries complete mind-merge with Talia (all memories, training, state secrets, shielding techniques); occasionally slips into her mannerisms/authority; untrained Mindspeech functional.
Arc: Witnessed entire village destroyed and people carried off during bandit attack → doesn't yet fully accept he caused the destruction himself → Gift-shock caused four-day unconsciousness during journey to Haven → complete mind-merge with Talia (should be fatal, survived through impossible magical feat) → taking on strategic leadership role combining headman experience with Talia's expertise.
Stance: [Senta] Chosen by her—bond snapped into place when their eyes locked → her unconditional love and mental bridges stabilized his fracturing mind enough to survive → shifted from resistance ('insufferable horse,' mercy killing request) to partnership ('we face it together'); accepts bond pragmatically but ordered her to knock him out if he loses control—accepts danger he poses; their connection allows mind-speech.
Stance: [Talia] Untrained Mindspeech forced through her shields → stabilized her mental collapse through direct contact → closed connection via kiss → now carries all her memories, training, state secrets, intimate knowledge; can use her techniques and protocol.
Stance: [Alberich] Assessed his loyalty pragmatically despite instinctive distrust of Karsites.
Quotes: 'I'm in no position to argue' (accepting bond pragmatically); 'If you tire, I'll drag you' (resisting care while accepting partnership).
Evidence gathered: Red robes hidden under bandit clothing; suspects organized sect; tracks lead toward Menmellith; theories captives meant for blood magic ritual sacrifice (old Karsite practice).

finalContent:

State: Recovering at Haven Healers' Collegium, assigned Healer's cottage for containment; newly confirmed immensely powerful Mage-Gift (not seen since Vanyel's era)—capable of leveling villages; carries complete mind-merge with Talia (all memories, training, state secrets, shielding techniques); occasionally slips into her mannerisms/authority; untrained Mindspeech functional.

Stance: [Talia] Untrained Mindspeech forced through her shields → stabilized her mental collapse through direct contact → closed connection via kiss → now carries all her memories, training, state secrets, intimate knowledge; can use her techniques and protocol.

Quotes: 'I'm in no position to argue' (accepting bond pragmatically); 'If you tire, I'll drag you' (resisting care while accepting partnership).
Evidence gathered: Red robes hidden under bandit clothing; suspects organized sect; tracks lead toward Menmellith; theories captives meant for blood magic ritual sacrifice (old Karsite practice).
